event_text: m_c found a small little patch of bright yellow flowers in camp, and snagged one to decorate {PRONOUN/m_c/self} with!
r_c takes m_c by surprise, swiftly decorating m_c with pretty yellow blooms. Bewildered, m_c thanks {PRONOUN/r_c/object} for the gift.
m_c purrs as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/stretch/stretches} smugly in the middle of camp, showing off the new purple blooms that decorate {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.
r_c, inbetween grooming m_c, gently dots m_c's fur with shades of purple flowers during a low sunset.
